title: Radar line
descriptionMarkdown:
## Desc
A book with 2 blueprints to setup *Radars* with an optimal range.

Full picture: https://imgur.com/SwEDJJa

### Radar line
This blueprint is a definitive setup to cover two 7x7 chunk area. It is simply two *Radars* spaced 14 chunks, connected by few *Big electric poles*. This plan is useful in determining which chunks to occupy for optimal coverage. Then you can move a Radar anywhere in the same chunk for the same coverage.

### Radar line (forward)
This blueprint is a version intended to cross the fog and conquer territory through a network of roboports. It contains an intermediate radar station in order to discover the opposite chunk of the line. This station which is represented in the screenshot is composed of two *Radars*, a *Big electric pole* and an *Alarm*. The alarm is optional, it acts as a reminder to easily locate the station and order its dismantling when it is no longer needed.

### Landfill
If there is water on the area, just paste this blueprint one more time.
